thread.title: Marcin Gortat involved in another blooper
thread.title_full: Marcin Gortat involved in another blooper

author: USA TODAY
title: Marcin Gortat involved in another blooper
text:
Marcin Gortat involved in another blooper Last game, he got hit in the face by John Wall. Poor Marcin Gortat. Post to Facebook Marcin Gortat involved in another blooper Last game, he got hit in the face by John Wall. Poor Marcin Gortat.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/03/marcin-gortat-scores-wrong-team-opposing-blooper-oops-again-head-wizards   Marcin Gortat involved in another blooper Alysha Tsuji , USA TODAY 11:22   
The Wizards' Marcin Gortat is not having the luckiest week. He's been at the center of two hilarious but unfortunate bloopers in back-to-back games. 
The one on Friday night is definitely the more unfortunate one of the two, since it cost the Wizards two points. When playing defense goes wrong ðŸ™ƒ pic.twitter.com/jMtRqBT1n8 â€” Bleacher Report (@BleacherReport) March 4, 2017 
That counted as two for the Raptors' Cory Joseph, and Toronto went on to win, 114-106. Poor Gortat. 
This is what happened to him the game before this one on Wednesday: He got accidentally smacked in the face with a pass from his own teammate, John Wall. Gotta keep your head on a swivel ðŸ‘€ #SCNotTop10 pic.twitter.com/2IfETuxklf 
At least he has a good sense of humor. Question is who will make @SHAQ ing-a-fool??? Me or John??? ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ â€” Marcin GortatðŸ‡µðŸ‡± (@MGortat) March 2, 2017 
But still, someone please give that guy a hug. Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/03/marcin-gortat-scores-wrong-team-opposing-blooper-oops-again-head-wizards Most Popular
